envy.question: Have I secretly wished that others' blessings would be taken away from them, thereby comparing my own life to theirs?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

envy.question: Have I looked at others' possessions and secretly wished for them to be taken away from them?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control when speaking to others, using language that was impolite or indecent?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in a way that was unbecoming of a daughter or mother
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others in a way that was unbecoming of a daughter or mother, using language that was crude or hurtful?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in using words that were hurtful to others
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control in using words that were hurtful to others, violating their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
gluttony.question: Have I overindulged in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, especially when it comes to sweets and snacks?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking to excess
gluttony.question: Have I indulged in eating or drinking to excess, disregarding my body's natural needs and desires?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: to social gatherings or celebrations that involved food and drink
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking, especially when invited to social gatherings or celebrations that involved food and drink?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

prodigality.question: Have I allowed excessive and wasteful spending to take precedence over my financial obligations, potentially harming those in need?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: of financial resources entrusted to me
before the needs and well - being of my family
prodigality.question: Have I excessive and wasteful risking of financial resources entrusted to me, putting them before the needs and well-being of my family?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in discussing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

gossip.question: Have I spoken words that brought pleasure to myself by sharing others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: especially towards those closest to me ,
rather than choosing reconciliation in our relationships
anger.question: Have I nursed anger, especially towards those closest to me, rather than choosing reconciliation in our relationships?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.
